house_listing.house_description: Absolutely must see! Beautiful transitional on large lot fronting attractive lake/pond! Cul-de-sac, 3 car garage, dual fuel heat, ceramic tile, custom brick patio, deck, huge eat-in kitchen, large windows, jetted tub, pristine! Southern woods is hot and this home is a gem!
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Fenced, Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Microwave, Pantry, Storage Space,Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
